an5.86:3.1: 86 Attaining the Methods of Textual Analysis
an5.86:4.1: A senior mendicant with five qualities is liked and approved by their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
an5.86:4.3: They have attained the textual analysis of meaning, text, terminology, and eloquence. And they are skilled and tireless in a diverse spectrum of duties for their spiritual companions, understanding how to go about things in order to complete and organize the work.
an5.86:4.4: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is liked and approved by their spiritual companions, respected and admired.‚Äù
